document.full_text: holder phil mickelson and four-times masters champion tiger woods were major talking points at augusta national on tuesday after being conspicuous by their absence from the course the previous day.
document.title: masters-mickelson overshadows woods as augusta favorite
lines_and_colors: holder phil mickelson and four-times masters champion tiger woods were major talking points at augusta national on tuesday after being conspicuous by their absence from the course the previous day.
